name: Gus, the ghost
description:
This is a submission for the GameDev.TV Game Jam 2022.

You play as Gustav the adventurer, who has a hard time surviving. Upon death you became a ghost to finish your unfinished business. Use your gravestone and ghost form to your advantage to reach the door for a new life, just to leave your meat-suit behind once more. Due to the trauma from your previous life if you get damaged while in ghost form, you get teleported to the start of the level.

I really hope you have fun playing!

Controls:

Movement: A / Left arrow and D / Right arrow

Jumping: W / Up arrow / Space

Restart level: R
